mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_email, user_password, user_name, user_gender, user_phone, terms_agree, user_agreedate, sms_agree, email_agree, user_birth,user_regdate,user_status) values (#{user_email},#{user_password},#{user_name},#{user_gender},#{user_phone},#{terms_agree},now(),#{sms_agree},#{email_agree},#{user_birth},now(),3)
insert into user_address(user_email, address1, address2,d_key) values (#{user_email},#{address1},#{address2},1)
mapper.update: update user_info set user_phone = #{user_phone} where user_seq = #{user_seq}
